entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 5.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Rupert Airport 3:25 PM PST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 5.7°C
Pressure: 100.1 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: 3.9°C
Wind: ESE 22 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 80 over exposed coastal sections. High 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 09 February 2023
